metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18778 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description:
ACME mini_httpd before 1.30 lets remote users read arbitrary files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18778` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mini-httpd - 1.23-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mini-httpd package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.23-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
